snippet.title: Zombie Rollerz: Pinball Heroes - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Zombie Rollerz: Pinball Heroes, the pinball game that features tower defense and rogue-like elements, is headed to PC and Switch on March 2, 2022. Check out the latest trailer for a look at gameplay and more. 

In Zombie Rollerz: Pinball Heroes, you have to shoot, slam, and smash your way through hordes of adorable, goofy zombies in this game which is a fusion of pinball and point defense.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #ZombieRollerz
